*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*United States of America*/location_mentioned**/p* *p**location_mentioned*Town of Tuscumbia and State of Alabama*/location_mentioned**/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="02-21-1826">21st February 1826*/date_mentioned*—*/p* *p**person_mentioned*Col. Austin */person_mentioned**/p* *p*Esteemed Sir At the solicitation of the *person_mentioned*friends of Mr Gillespie*/person_mentioned* I write to enquire after the circumstances of his death. *person_mentioned*Mrs. Gillespie*/person_mentioned* says *person_mentioned*Mr Gillespie*/person_mentioned* left *location_mentioned*home */location_mentioned*with five hundred dollars and had made arrangements, whereby he was to receive as much more in *location_mentioned*Natches*/location_mentioned* making the sum of one thousand dollars Some of his *person_mentioned*friends*/person_mentioned* are of opinion that he received several hundred dollars on the way that his *person_mentioned*family*/person_mentioned* knew nothing of. it appears however very certain that he aught to have had $1000. His fellow *person_mentioned*Traveller */person_mentioned*and *person_mentioned*confident */person_mentioned*(*person_mentioned*Capt. Lusk*/person_mentioned*) writes from *location_mentioned*New Orleans*/location_mentioned* in a very short and unexplanatory manner informing *person_mentioned*Mrs. Gillespie*/person_mentioned* of her *person_mentioned*Husband*/person_mentioned*s death stating he had died after some ten or fifteen days Illness at the *location_mentioned*Fort in your Colony*/location_mentioned* (I suppose the *location_mentioned*Fort Settlement*/location_mentioned*) that he *person_mentioned*Capt Lusk*/person_mentioned* had sold *person_mentioned*Mr. Gillespie*/person_mentioned*'s horse to pay his Burial expenses that himself was then in *location_mentioned*New Orlean*/location_mentioned* on his way to the State of *location_mentioned*Ohio*/location_mentioned*. There is nothing in *person_mentioned*Capt Lusk*/person_mentioned*s letter to give us to understand what disposition was made of the money he (*person_mentioned*Mr Gillespie*/person_mentioned*) had. There appears to be a mistery in the affair which makes it due to the *person_mentioned*family of Mr Gillespie*/person_mentioned* and the character of *person_mentioned*Capt. Lusk*/person_mentioned* that an enquiry should be made as such you would confer a favour on us by making such enquiries as would account for the disposition of the money he had with him whether disposed of in the purchase of Land or otherwise and give us as early information as may comport with your convenience.*/p*
*p*Your *location_mentioned*Country*/location_mentioned* is much spoken of here and much more in *location_mentioned*Tennessee*/location_mentioned* and *location_mentioned*Kentucky*/location_mentioned*—*person_mentioned*Judge Ellis*/person_mentioned* and some other gentlemen will be to see it this *date_mentioned n="Spring - 1826">Spring */date_mentioned*The *person_mentioned*judge*/person_mentioned* will make arrangements for my coming. I wrote you by *person_mentioned*Mr Gillespie*/person_mentioned* consequently have but little to say here You will write me on every subject which might be of any importance as it is seldom we receive the Truth from *location_mentioned*Texas*/location_mentioned*. I expect young *person_mentioned*Mr Hughs*/person_mentioned* will have arrived before you receive this as he left here some time ago.*/p*
*p*I have been told of a Proclamation of *person_mentioned*Mr Edwards*/person_mentioned* requiring the holders of *location_mentioned*Old Grants */location_mentioned**location_mentioned*Swithin the Limits of his ettlement*/location_mentioned* to come forward I think probably one of my *location_mentioned*grants */location_mentioned*are *location_mentioned*within his district */location_mentioned*if so you have no doubt made it known.*/p*
*p*offer my respects to *person_mentioned*Capt Gray*/person_mentioned* and tell him when he writes me again to write more fully that I am never tired of receiving information from a *location_mentioned*country*/location_mentioned* in which I feel so much interest. I have spoken for a pair of grey Hounds for your *person_mentioned*Brother*/person_mentioned* which If I succeed in getting will Bring when I come. Believe me to be most sincerely your Obedient Humble Servt.*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*R. R. Royall*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Hon. S. F. Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*[Addressed:] *person_mentioned*Hon. Stephen F. Austin*/person_mentioned*. *location_mentioned*Nachitoches. State of Louisiana*/location_mentioned* The *person_mentioned*Post master at *location_mentioned*Nachitoches*/location_mentioned**/person_mentioned* will forward this by the first *person_mentioned*safe hand*/person_mentioned* to *location_mentioned*Austin's colony Department of Texas in the U. Mexican States*/location_mentioned**/p*
